titleStmt.title: L'Estrange no papist nor Jesuite discussed in a short discourse between Philo-L'Estrange and Pragmaticus.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: A different work from the one entitled: L'Estrange no papist : in answer to a libel (L1267).
Attributed to L'Estrange by Halkett and Laing and by G. Ketchin, Sir Roger L'Estrange, p. 415, though not by Wing (2nd ed.).
This item appears at reel 696:5 as Wing L1267A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1725:14 as Wing L1328B.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
